subtitles.title: Project Description
subtitles.content: Library of Meialia is a 2D rogue-like pixel game developed by Minerva Studio, where the player play as a dragon Almos exploring the ancient library of Meialia to uncover its secrets gradually. The game features 80+ skills, 50+ unique items, 20+ mobs in 4 different environmental biomes, which each having their unique bosses. While still in early access stage, this game has already earned 3000+ players. Actively updating based on user feedback, we are looking for a formal release around June 2026. Steam page at https://store.steampowered.com/app/3102950/Library_of_Meialia/

subtitles.title: My Responsibility
subtitles.content:
Took on multiple roles in Minerva Studio for Library of Meialia, serving as Lead Narrative Designer while also handling game design, programming, marketing, and project management
Collaborated closely with other team leads to ensure a smooth and immersive player experience in both combat flow and story progression
Led development of the gameâ€™s narrative, including story arc, world-building, character development, and dialogue writing
Designed and implemented in-game tools and systems for displaying and managing storylines
Contributed to level design and enemy design to maintain a cohesive and engaging overall gameplay experience
